SETUP: : brown_town will play as USSR.
deuxbh will play as USA.
Handicap influence: US +2
Scenario: Standard
Optional Cards Added
Time per Player: 45 Minutes
USSR +4 in Poland [0][4]
USSR +1 in East Germany [0][4]
USSR +1 in Austria [0][1]
US +4 in West Germany [4][0]
US +4 in Italy [4][0]
US +1 in Iran [2][0]

Turn 1, Headline Phase: Vietnam Revolts* & Captured Nazi Scientist*: USSR Headlines Vietnam Revolts*
US Headlines Captured Nazi Scientist*
Event: Vietnam Revolts*
USSR +2 in Vietnam [0][2]
Vietnam Revolts* is now in play.

Event: Captured Nazi Scientist*
US advances to 1 in the Space Race.
US gains 2 VP. Score is US 2.

USSR +4 in Thailand [0][4]

US +3 in France [3][0]


Turn 1, USSR AR2: Asia Scoring: Event: Asia Scoring
USSR gains 6 VP. Score is USSR 4.


Turn 1, US AR2: Europe Scoring: Event: Europe Scoring
US gains 5 VP. Score is US 1.

SUCCESS: 4 [ + 4 - 2x2 = 4 ]

DEFCON degrades to 4

Red Scare/Purge is no longer in play.
